actionCalls.label: Application is in Need More Information Status

value.stringValue: Application status changed for the Application {!myVariable_current.Name}.

Hello {!myVariable_current.Patient__r.FirstName},
Please note that status of your application {!myVariable_current.Name} has changed to {!myVariable_current.Application_Status__c}. Please take a look at application for more details.
Thanks, Susan G. Komen

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: Status changed and Portal User Present
